00010 #define swap16(x) ( (((x)>>8) &0x00FF) \
00011                   | (((x)<<8) &0xFF00) )
00012 #define swap32(x) ( (((x)>>24)&0x000000FF) \
00013                   | (((x)>>8) &0x0000FF00) \
00014                   | (((x)<<8) &0x00FF0000) \
00015                   | (((x)<<24)&0xFF000000) )
00016 
00017 #define kFullMessageIDMask (CAN_MSGID_API_M | CAN_MSGID_MFR_M | CAN_MSGID_DTYPE_M)

00020 const double CANJaguar::kApproxBusVoltage;
00021 
00025 void CANJaguar::InitCANJaguar()
00026 {
00027     m_transactionSemaphore = semMCreate(SEM_Q_PRIORITY | SEM_INVERSION_SAFE | SEM_DELETE_SAFE);
00028     if (m_deviceNumber < 1 || m_deviceNumber > 63)
00029     {
00030         // Error
00031         printf("ERROR: Invalid CAN device number \"%d\" - must be between 1 and 63.\n", m_deviceNumber);
00032         return;
00033     }
00034     UINT32 fwVer = GetFirmwareVersion();
00035     // 3330 was the first shipping RDK firmware version for the Jaguar
00036     if (fwVer >= 3330 || fwVer < 92)
00037     {
00038         printf("fwVersion[%d]: %d\n", m_deviceNumber, fwVer);
00039         if (fwVer < 3330)
00040         {
00041             printf("ERROR: Jaguar %d firmware is too old.  It must be updated to at least version 92 of the FIRST approved firmware!\n", m_deviceNumber);
00042         }
00043         else
00044         {
00045             printf("ERROR: Jaguar %d firmware is not FIRST approved.  It must be updated to at least version 92 of the FIRST approved firmware!\n", m_deviceNumber);
00046         }
00047         wpi_assertCleanStatus(kRIOStatusVersionMismatch);
00048         return;
00049     }
00050     switch (m_controlMode)
00051     {
00052     case kPercentVbus:
00053     case kVoltage:
00054         // No additional configuration required... start enabled.
00055         EnableControl();
00056         break;
00057     default:
00058         break;
00059     }
00060     m_safetyHelper = new MotorSafetyHelper(this);
00061 }
00062 
00068 CANJaguar::CANJaguar(UINT8 deviceNumber, ControlMode controlMode)
00069     : m_deviceNumber (deviceNumber)
00070     , m_controlMode (controlMode)
00071     , m_transactionSemaphore (NULL)
00072     , m_maxOutputVoltage (kApproxBusVoltage)
00073     , m_safetyHelper (NULL)
00074 {
00075     InitCANJaguar();
00076 }
00077 
00078 CANJaguar::~CANJaguar()
00079 {
00080     delete m_safetyHelper;
00081     m_safetyHelper = NULL;
00082     semDelete(m_transactionSemaphore);
00083     m_transactionSemaphore = NULL;
00084 }
00085 
00099 void CANJaguar::Set(float outputValue, UINT8 syncGroup)
00100 {
00101     UINT32 messageID;
00102     UINT8 dataBuffer[8];
00103     UINT8 dataSize;
00104 
00105     if (m_safetyHelper && !m_safetyHelper->IsAlive())
00106     {
00107         EnableControl();
00108     }
00109 
00110     switch(m_controlMode)
00111     {
00112     case kPercentVbus:
00113         {
00114             messageID = LM_API_VOLT_T_SET;
00115             if (outputValue > 1.0) outputValue = 1.0;
00116             if (outputValue < -1.0) outputValue = -1.0;
00117             dataSize = packPercentage(dataBuffer, outputValue);
00118         }
00119         break;
00120     case kSpeed:
00121         {
00122             messageID = LM_API_SPD_T_SET;
00123             dataSize = packFXP16_16(dataBuffer, outputValue);
00124         }
00125         break;
00126     case kPosition:
00127         {
00128             messageID = LM_API_POS_T_SET;
00129             dataSize = packFXP16_16(dataBuffer, outputValue);
00130         }
00131         break;
00132     case kCurrent:
00133         {
00134             messageID = LM_API_ICTRL_T_SET;
00135             dataSize = packFXP8_8(dataBuffer, outputValue);
00136         }
00137         break;
00138     case kVoltage:
00139         {
00140             messageID = LM_API_VCOMP_T_SET;
00141             dataSize = packFXP8_8(dataBuffer, outputValue);
00142         }
00143         break;
00144     default:
00145         return;
00146     }
00147     if (syncGroup != 0)
00148     {
00149         dataBuffer[dataSize] = syncGroup;
00150         dataSize++;
00151     }
00152     setTransaction(messageID, dataBuffer, dataSize);
00153     if (m_safetyHelper) m_safetyHelper->Feed();
00154 }
00155 
00168 float CANJaguar::Get()
00169 {
00170     UINT8 dataBuffer[8];
00171     UINT8 dataSize;
00172 
00173     switch(m_controlMode)
00174     {
00175     case kPercentVbus:
00176         getTransaction(LM_API_VOLT_SET, dataBuffer, &dataSize);
00177         if (dataSize == sizeof(INT16))
00178         {
00179             return unpackPercentage(dataBuffer);
00180         }
00181         break;
00182     case kSpeed:
00183         getTransaction(LM_API_SPD_SET, dataBuffer, &dataSize);
00184         if (dataSize == sizeof(INT32))
00185         {
00186             return unpackFXP16_16(dataBuffer);
00187         }
00188         break;
00189     case kPosition:
00190         getTransaction(LM_API_POS_SET, dataBuffer, &dataSize);
00191         if (dataSize == sizeof(INT32))
00192         {
00193             return unpackFXP16_16(dataBuffer);
00194         }
00195         break;
00196     case kCurrent:
00197         getTransaction(LM_API_ICTRL_SET, dataBuffer, &dataSize);
00198         if (dataSize == sizeof(INT16))
00199         {
00200             return unpackFXP8_8(dataBuffer);
00201         }
00202         break;
00203     case kVoltage:
00204         getTransaction(LM_API_VCOMP_SET, dataBuffer, &dataSize);
00205         if (dataSize == sizeof(INT16))
00206         {
00207             return unpackFXP8_8(dataBuffer);
00208         }
00209         break;
00210     }
00211     return 0.0;
00212 }

00239         // TODO: Error... only percent vbus mode supported for PID API
00240     }

00243 UINT8 CANJaguar::packPercentage(UINT8 *buffer, double value)
00244 {
00245     INT16 intValue = (INT16)(value * 32767.0);
00246     *((INT16*)buffer) = swap16(intValue);
00247     return sizeof(INT16);
00248 }
00249 
00250 UINT8 CANJaguar::packFXP8_8(UINT8 *buffer, double value)
00251 {
00252     INT16 intValue = (INT16)(value * 256.0);
00253     *((INT16*)buffer) = swap16(intValue);
00254     return sizeof(INT16);
00255 }
00256 
00257 UINT8 CANJaguar::packFXP16_16(UINT8 *buffer, double value)
00258 {
00259     INT32 intValue = (INT32)(value * 65536.0);
00260     *((INT32*)buffer) = swap32(intValue);
00261     return sizeof(INT32);
00262 }
00263 
00264 UINT8 CANJaguar::packINT16(UINT8 *buffer, INT16 value)
00265 {
00266     *((INT16*)buffer) = swap16(value);
00267     return sizeof(INT16);
00268 }
00269 
00270 UINT8 CANJaguar::packINT32(UINT8 *buffer, INT32 value)
00271 {
00272     *((INT32*)buffer) = swap32(value);
00273     return sizeof(INT32);
00274 }
00275 
00276 double CANJaguar::unpackPercentage(UINT8 *buffer)
00277 {
00278     INT16 value = *((INT16*)buffer);
00279     value = swap16(value);
00280     return value / 32767.0;
00281 }
00282 
00283 double CANJaguar::unpackFXP8_8(UINT8 *buffer)
00284 {
00285     INT16 value = *((INT16*)buffer);
00286     value = swap16(value);
00287     return value / 256.0;
00288 }
00289 
00290 double CANJaguar::unpackFXP16_16(UINT8 *buffer)
00291 {
00292     INT32 value = *((INT32*)buffer);
00293     value = swap32(value);
00294     return value / 65536.0;
00295 }

00299     INT16 value = *((INT16*)buffer);
00300     return swap16(value);
00301 }
00302 
00303 INT32 CANJaguar::unpackINT32(UINT8 *buffer)
00304 {
00305     INT32 value = *((INT32*)buffer);
00306     return swap32(value);

00308 
00320 INT32 CANJaguar::sendMessage(UINT32 messageID, const UINT8 *data, UINT8 dataSize)
00321 {
00322     static const UINT32 kTrustedMessages[] = {
00323             LM_API_VOLT_T_EN, LM_API_VOLT_T_SET, LM_API_SPD_T_EN, LM_API_SPD_T_SET,
00324             LM_API_VCOMP_T_EN, LM_API_VCOMP_T_SET, LM_API_POS_T_EN, LM_API_POS_T_SET,
00325             LM_API_ICTRL_T_EN, LM_API_ICTRL_T_SET};
00326     INT32 status=0;
00327 
00328     for (UINT8 i=0; i<(sizeof(kTrustedMessages)/sizeof(kTrustedMessages[0])); i++)
00329     {
00330         if ((kFullMessageIDMask & messageID) == kTrustedMessages[i])
00331         {
00332             UINT8 dataBuffer[8];
00333             dataBuffer[0] = 0;
00334             dataBuffer[1] = 0;
00335             // Make sure the data will still fit after adjusting for the token.
00336             if (dataSize > 6)
00337             {
00338                 // TODO: Error
00339                 return 0;
00340             }
00341             for (UINT8 j=0; j < dataSize; j++)
00342             {
00343                 dataBuffer[j + 2] = data[j];
00344             }
00345             FRC_NetworkCommunication_JaguarCANDriver_sendMessage(messageID, dataBuffer, dataSize + 2, &status);
00346             return status;
00347         }
00348     }
00349     FRC_NetworkCommunication_JaguarCANDriver_sendMessage(messageID, data, dataSize, &status);
00350     return status;
00351 }
00352 
00362 INT32 CANJaguar::receiveMessage(UINT32 *messageID, UINT8 *data, UINT8 *dataSize, float timeout)
00363 {
00364     INT32 status = 0;
00365     FRC_NetworkCommunication_JaguarCANDriver_receiveMessage(messageID, data, dataSize,
00366             (UINT32)(timeout * 1000), &status);
00367     return status;
00368 }
00369 
00380 void CANJaguar::setTransaction(UINT32 messageID, const UINT8 *data, UINT8 dataSize)
00381 {
00382     UINT32 ackMessageID = LM_API_ACK | m_deviceNumber;
00383     INT32 status = 0;
00384 
00385     // Make sure we don't have more than one transaction with the same Jaguar outstanding.
00386     semTake(m_transactionSemaphore, WAIT_FOREVER);
00387 
00388     // Throw away any stale acks.
00389     receiveMessage(&ackMessageID, NULL, 0, 0.0f);
00390     // Send the message with the data.
00391     status = sendMessage(messageID | m_deviceNumber, data, dataSize);
00392     wpi_assertCleanStatus(status);
00393     // Wait for an ack.
00394     status = receiveMessage(&ackMessageID, NULL, 0);
00395     wpi_assertCleanStatus(status);
00396 
00397     // Transaction complete.
00398     semGive(m_transactionSemaphore);
00399 }
00400 
00410 void CANJaguar::getTransaction(UINT32 messageID, UINT8 *data, UINT8 *dataSize)
00411 {
00412     UINT32 targetedMessageID = messageID | m_deviceNumber;
00413     INT32 status = 0;
00414 
00415     // Make sure we don't have more than one transaction with the same Jaguar outstanding.
00416     semTake(m_transactionSemaphore, WAIT_FOREVER);
00417 
00418     // Send the message requesting data.
00419     status = sendMessage(targetedMessageID, NULL, 0);
00420     wpi_assertCleanStatus(status);
00421     // Caller may have set bit31 for remote frame transmission so clear invalid bits[31-29]
00422     targetedMessageID &= 0x1FFFFFFF;
00423     // Wait for the data.
00424     status = receiveMessage(&targetedMessageID, data, dataSize);
00425     wpi_assertCleanStatus(status);
00426 
00427     // Transaction complete.
00428     semGive(m_transactionSemaphore);
00429 }

00452 CANJaguar::SpeedReference CANJaguar::GetSpeedReference(void)
00453 {

00455     UINT8 dataSize;
00456 
00457     getTransaction(LM_API_SPD_REF, dataBuffer, &dataSize);
00458     if (dataSize == sizeof(UINT8))
00459     {
00460         return (SpeedReference)*dataBuffer;
00461     }
00462     return kSpeedRef_None;

00506 void CANJaguar::SetPID(double p, double i, double d)
00507 {
00508     UINT8 dataBuffer[8];
00509     UINT8 dataSize;
00510 
00511     switch(m_controlMode)
00512     {
00513     case kPercentVbus:
00514     case kVoltage:
00515         // TODO: Error, Not Valid
00516         break;
00517     case kSpeed:
00518         dataSize = packFXP16_16(dataBuffer, p);
00519         setTransaction(LM_API_SPD_PC, dataBuffer, dataSize);
00520         dataSize = packFXP16_16(dataBuffer, i);
00521         setTransaction(LM_API_SPD_IC, dataBuffer, dataSize);
00522         dataSize = packFXP16_16(dataBuffer, d);
00523         setTransaction(LM_API_SPD_DC, dataBuffer, dataSize);
00524         break;
00525     case kPosition:
00526         dataSize = packFXP16_16(dataBuffer, p);
00527         setTransaction(LM_API_POS_PC, dataBuffer, dataSize);
00528         dataSize = packFXP16_16(dataBuffer, i);
00529         setTransaction(LM_API_POS_IC, dataBuffer, dataSize);
00530         dataSize = packFXP16_16(dataBuffer, d);
00531         setTransaction(LM_API_POS_DC, dataBuffer, dataSize);
00532         break;
00533     case kCurrent:
00534         dataSize = packFXP16_16(dataBuffer, p);
00535         setTransaction(LM_API_ICTRL_PC, dataBuffer, dataSize);
00536         dataSize = packFXP16_16(dataBuffer, i);
00537         setTransaction(LM_API_ICTRL_IC, dataBuffer, dataSize);
00538         dataSize = packFXP16_16(dataBuffer, d);
00539         setTransaction(LM_API_ICTRL_DC, dataBuffer, dataSize);
00540         break;
00541     }
00542 }

00562         if (dataSize == sizeof(INT32))
00563         {
00564             return unpackFXP16_16(dataBuffer);
00565         }
00566         break;
00567     case kPosition:
00568         getTransaction(LM_API_POS_PC, dataBuffer, &dataSize);
00569         if (dataSize == sizeof(INT32))

00677 void CANJaguar::EnableControl(double encoderInitialPosition)
00678 {
00679     UINT8 dataBuffer[8];
00680     UINT8 dataSize = 0;
00681 
00682     switch(m_controlMode)
00683     {
00684     case kPercentVbus:
00685         setTransaction(LM_API_VOLT_T_EN, dataBuffer, dataSize);
00686         break;
00687     case kSpeed:
00688         setTransaction(LM_API_SPD_T_EN, dataBuffer, dataSize);
00689         break;
00690     case kPosition:
00691         dataSize = packFXP16_16(dataBuffer, encoderInitialPosition);
00692         setTransaction(LM_API_POS_T_EN, dataBuffer, dataSize);
00693         break;
00694     case kCurrent:
00695         setTransaction(LM_API_ICTRL_T_EN, dataBuffer, dataSize);
00696         break;
00697     case kVoltage:
00698         setTransaction(LM_API_VCOMP_T_EN, dataBuffer, dataSize);
00699         break;
00700     }
00701 }
00702 
00708 void CANJaguar::DisableControl()
00709 {
00710     UINT8 dataBuffer[8];
00711     UINT8 dataSize = 0;
00712 
00713     switch(m_controlMode)
00714     {
00715     case kPercentVbus:
00716         setTransaction(LM_API_VOLT_DIS, dataBuffer, dataSize);
00717         break;
00718     case kSpeed:
00719         setTransaction(LM_API_SPD_DIS, dataBuffer, dataSize);
00720         break;
00721     case kPosition:
00722         setTransaction(LM_API_POS_DIS, dataBuffer, dataSize);
00723         break;
00724     case kCurrent:
00725         setTransaction(LM_API_ICTRL_DIS, dataBuffer, dataSize);
00726         break;
00727     case kVoltage:
00728         setTransaction(LM_API_VCOMP_DIS, dataBuffer, dataSize);
00729         break;
00730     }
00731 }

00741 void CANJaguar::ChangeControlMode(ControlMode controlMode)
00742 {
00743     // Disable the previous mode
00744     DisableControl();
00745 
00746     // Update the local mode
00747     m_controlMode = controlMode;
00748 }

00757 CANJaguar::ControlMode CANJaguar::GetControlMode()
00758 {
00759     UINT8 dataBuffer[8];
00760     UINT8 dataSize;
00761 
00762     getTransaction(LM_API_STATUS_CMODE, dataBuffer, &dataSize);
00763     if (dataSize == sizeof(INT8))
00764     {
00765         return (ControlMode)dataBuffer[0];
00766     }
00767     return kPercentVbus;

00884 bool CANJaguar::GetForwardLimitOK()
00885 {
00886     UINT8 dataBuffer[8];
00887     UINT8 dataSize;
00888 
00889     getTransaction(LM_API_STATUS_LIMIT, dataBuffer, &dataSize);
00890     if (dataSize == sizeof(UINT8))
00891     {
00892         return (*dataBuffer & kForwardLimit) != 0;
00893     }
00894     return 0;
00895 }
00896 
00902 bool CANJaguar::GetReverseLimitOK()
00903 {
00904     UINT8 dataBuffer[8];
00905     UINT8 dataSize;
00906 
00907     getTransaction(LM_API_STATUS_LIMIT, dataBuffer, &dataSize);
00908     if (dataSize == sizeof(UINT8))
00909     {
00910         return (*dataBuffer & kReverseLimit) != 0;
00911     }
00912     return 0;
00913 }
00914 
00920 UINT16 CANJaguar::GetFaults()
00921 {
00922     UINT8 dataBuffer[8];
00923     UINT8 dataSize;
00924 
00925     getTransaction(LM_API_STATUS_FAULT, dataBuffer, &dataSize);
00926     if (dataSize == sizeof(UINT16))
00927     {
00928         return unpackINT16(dataBuffer);
00929     }
00930     return 0;
00931 }
00932 
00941 bool CANJaguar::GetPowerCycled()
00942 {
00943     UINT8 dataBuffer[8];
00944     UINT8 dataSize;
00945 
00946     getTransaction(LM_API_STATUS_POWER, dataBuffer, &dataSize);
00947     if (dataSize == sizeof(UINT8))
00948     {
00949         bool powerCycled = (*dataBuffer != 0);
00950 
00951         // Clear the power cycled bit now that we've accessed it
00952         if (powerCycled)
00953         {
00954             dataBuffer[0] = 1;
00955             setTransaction(LM_API_STATUS_POWER, dataBuffer, sizeof(UINT8));
00956         }
00957 
00958         return powerCycled;
00959     }
00960     return 0;
00961 }
00962 
00971 void CANJaguar::SetVoltageRampRate(double rampRate)
00972 {
00973     UINT8 dataBuffer[8];
00974     UINT8 dataSize;
00975 
00976     switch(m_controlMode)
00977     {
00978     case kPercentVbus:
00979         dataSize = packPercentage(dataBuffer, rampRate / (m_maxOutputVoltage * kControllerRate));
00980         setTransaction(LM_API_VOLT_SET_RAMP, dataBuffer, dataSize);
00981         break;
00982     case kVoltage:
00983         dataSize = packFXP8_8(dataBuffer, rampRate / kControllerRate);
00984         setTransaction(LM_API_VCOMP_IN_RAMP, dataBuffer, dataSize);
00985         break;
00986     default:
00987         return;
00988     }
00989 }
00990 
00996 UINT32 CANJaguar::GetFirmwareVersion()
00997 {
00998     UINT8 dataBuffer[8];
00999     UINT8 dataSize;
01000 
01001     // Set the MSB to tell the 2CAN that this is a remote message.
01002     getTransaction(0x80000000 | CAN_MSGID_API_FIRMVER, dataBuffer, &dataSize);
01003     if (dataSize == sizeof(UINT32))
01004     {
01005         return unpackINT32(dataBuffer);
01006     }
01007     return 0;
01008 }
01009 
01015 UINT8 CANJaguar::GetHardwareVersion()
01016 {
01017     UINT8 dataBuffer[8];
01018     UINT8 dataSize;
01019 
01020     getTransaction(LM_API_HWVER, dataBuffer, &dataSize);
01021     if (dataSize == sizeof(UINT8)+sizeof(UINT8))
01022     {
01023         if (*dataBuffer == m_deviceNumber)
01024         {
01025             return *(dataBuffer+1);
01026         }
01027     }
01028     // Assume Gray Jag if there is no response
01029     return LM_HWVER_JAG_1_0;
01030 }

01088 void CANJaguar::ConfigSoftPositionLimits(double forwardLimitPosition, double reverseLimitPosition)
01089 {
01090     UINT8 dataBuffer[8];
01091     UINT8 dataSize;
01092 
01093     dataSize = packFXP16_16(dataBuffer, forwardLimitPosition);
01094     dataBuffer[dataSize++] = forwardLimitPosition > reverseLimitPosition;
01095     setTransaction(LM_API_CFG_LIMIT_FWD, dataBuffer, dataSize);
01096 
01097     dataSize = packFXP16_16(dataBuffer, reverseLimitPosition);
01098     dataBuffer[dataSize++] = forwardLimitPosition <= reverseLimitPosition;
01099     setTransaction(LM_API_CFG_LIMIT_REV, dataBuffer, dataSize);
01100 
01101     dataBuffer[0] = kLimitMode_SoftPositionLimits;
01102     setTransaction(LM_API_CFG_LIMIT_MODE, dataBuffer, sizeof(UINT8));
01103 }
01104 
01110 void CANJaguar::DisableSoftPositionLimits()
01111 {
01112     UINT8 dataBuffer[8];
01113 
01114     dataBuffer[0] = kLimitMode_SwitchInputsOnly;
01115     setTransaction(LM_API_CFG_LIMIT_MODE, dataBuffer, sizeof(UINT8));
01116 }

01144 void CANJaguar::ConfigFaultTime(float faultTime)
01145 {
01146     UINT8 dataBuffer[8];
01147     UINT8 dataSize;
01148 
01149     // Message takes ms
01150     dataSize = packINT16(dataBuffer, (INT16)(faultTime * 1000.0));
01151     setTransaction(LM_API_CFG_FAULT_TIME, dataBuffer, dataSize);
01152 }

01159 void CANJaguar::UpdateSyncGroup(UINT8 syncGroup)
